DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine bioequivalence of amodiaquine suspension ( Pfizer) and the WHO approved reference product Flavoquine® tablet ( Sanofi Aventis).
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Camoquin® Suspension (Pfizer) To Flavoquine® Tablets (Sanofi Aventis) In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years, inclusive. Body Mass Index (BMI) of 18 to 30 kg/m2; and a total body weight >45 kg (99 lbs). An informed consent document signed and dated by the subject or a legally acceptable representative. A history of drug induced agranulocytosis and history of liver and hematological problems while taking amodiaquine. Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption (eg, gastrectomy). A positive urine drug screen.
